metaDescription: Sell your Glenfarclas Family Casks and vintage bottles. We buy the entire Family Cask range 1950s-2000s. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy the Glenfarclas Family Casks and rare vintages.
introParagraph: Glenfarclas is unique for its extensive library of vintage casks. The Family Casks series allows collectors to own single years from the 1950s to today. We purchase the entire Family Casks range, as well as the 30, 40, and 50 Year Old core releases. Sell your vintage Glenfarclas directly.
conditionFactors: Presence of the mini brochure in the box (for Family Casks)
pricingFactors: Release date (Family Casks have multiple releases for same vintage)

faqs.question: Do you buy any vintage of Family Casks?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are interested in every vintage of the Family Casks series.

faqs.question: Is the 25 Year Old valuable?
faqs.answer: We buy the 25 Year, but it is a core range product. The 30 and 40 Year are significantly more valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 105 Cask Strength?
faqs.answer: We generally only buy the aged 20 Year or 40 Year versions of the 105.

faqs.question: Do I need the wooden box?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Family Casks wooden box is essential.

faqs.question: Do you buy 15 Year?
faqs.answer: Typically no, unless it is an older bottling.

faqs.question: How do I ship the heavy wooden box?
faqs.answer: We recommend wrapping the bottle and box separately to avoid damage during shipping.
